body_html: @peterwilliams97 Did you try asking in the keras github repo? I do not have much experience in keras to comment on it but have you tried running it on a cpu? Sometimes CUDA acts weird which has caused me to choose native GRU rather than cudnn_gru when using while loops in tensorflow

body: @peterwilliams97 Did you try asking in the keras github repo? I do not have much experience in keras to comment on it but have you tried running it on a cpu? Sometimes CUDA acts weird which has caused me to choose native GRU rather than cudnn_gru when using while loops in tensorflow
